ISSUE.TITLE: Error printing a PDF on Linux
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: latest from develop Steps to reproduce the problem: I think there was a mistake in this commit https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/commit/aa746f07c09ba6bae3301bd22feab1af0bb404a4 Why did you delete the `HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.Linux` package? This brought back issue #6464.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7192 Returned back the reference for HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.Linux library
